name: PromptPolish
description: Refine and A/B test prompts for LLMs with a simple interface. Compare outputs, track versions, and optimize your AI prompts for better results.

name: EmbedScout
description: Search and manage vector embeddings with a simple UI. Supports multiple embedding models and similarity search out of the box.

name: CronPilot
description: Schedule and monitor background jobs for your micro SaaS. Get alerts for failed jobs and view execution history.

name: WebhookWatch
description: Capture, replay, and inspect webhooks in development. Never miss a webhook during local development again.

name: DatasetDash
description: Curate training datasets with collaborative labeling workflows. Perfect for ML teams working on custom models.

name: API Forge
description: Generate REST APIs from JSON schemas instantly. Perfect for prototyping and mocking backend services.

name: AuthLite
description: Drop-in email magic-link authentication for your prototypes and MVPs. No passwords, just magic links.

name: ImageFlow
description: Transform and optimize images on-the-fly via URL parameters. Resize, crop, and apply filters with a simple API.

name: MailTrail
description: Preview and test your transactional emails during development. Never send test emails to real users by accident.

name: MeterMint
description: Track usage metrics locally before wiring up billing. Understand your usage patterns before going to production.
